text: Marc Basnight (May 13, 1947 – December 28, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Basnight was born in Manteo, North Carolina. From 1985 to 2011, he was a member of the North Carolina Senate. From 1993 to 2011, he was President pro tempore of the state senate. Basnight died on December 28, 2020 in Manteo from problems caused by progressive bulbar palsy at the age of 73.Dare’s political powerhouse, Marc Basnight, dies ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease
title: Marc Basnight
